short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the ERC 20 and ERC 721 transactions behind .eth and Ethereum addresses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ethereum Name Service Explorer enables you to discover Token, DAO, NFT, and other ERC 20 and ERC 721 transactions of your favorite Web3 users.  Exploration is simple. With ENS Explorer, you don't have to open multiple websites (e.g. Go to ENS and then go to Etherscan) to find out what different tokens, DAOs, and NFTs people are investing in.  Just click on the extension and go!
(1) Open the ENS Explorer sidebar
(2) Type in an ENS address or an Ethereum address and quickly see the following information
- Registrant for the ENS address
- Other ENS addresses listed under the registrant
- Ethereum balance
- Token, DAO, and NFT transactions (we list the ERC 20 and ERC 721 transactions)

The team would love to hear your feedback and we're eager to make this extension better. 

v1.0.1 - Initial release
v1.0.2 - Fixed bug that redirected some websites to extension; added uninstall form
